divs: Sighting Detailsi walked to the store looked up and saw a glowing red orange white and yellow disc in the sky i watched it for 5 min as it went up quickly then out of no where a big helicopter which looked like a government black helicopter went up to it and they both stopped like they were staring at each other then the helicopter turned around and circled the area as the ufo flew up and vanished and eventually the helicopter flew away
